attributes.action: Tell us if you also believe the 490,000 pounds police overtime is the REAL truth behind Operation Yewtree?
attributes.additional_details: Since this case arises out of historic circumstances where corrupt police officers, corrupt BBC managers and corrupt politicians (the common factor being that they were all highly paid out of taxpayer pounds) nurtured and succoured Jimmy Savile while he abused children, and THEN those same corrupt taxpayer funded employees went on to protect him from investigation and prosecution, the police need to be looking inwards and at the BBC and down into the depths of the cesspit known as the House of Commons.
